website_summaries.verdict: Simple, solid-colored rain boots that are extremely well-constructed and reasonably priced for the quality.
pros: We love that these are made from 100% natural rubber
Very well-made boots with deep grips and extra rubber around the soles to avoid the chance of leakage
cons: Run a bit big, so either size down or put thick socks on your child

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the boots is a lot better than I was expecting for the price. The rubber is pretty thick and seems to be pretty durable. They were also delivered three days sooner than the estimated delivery date, so that's always a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and seem to be well made. My 18mo usually wears a 5-5.5 so I ordered a size 6 thinking he would have a little room to grow but these are HUUGE on him! He has at least an inch from the tip of his toe to the tip of the boot while he is wearing them. I ordered a size 5 so we will see how those fit. I really like the style and quality, they just run very large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big - no exchange available & price went up to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these boots and after reading multiple reviews, I meant to order my son's current size, not his next size up. They arrived on time and my son loved them, but he fell right out of them so I knew even with enough socks, they would be too big. I tried to exchange them but was only able to return. Then when I went to buy the correct size, they were $6.00 more than when I just purchased them 4 days ago! That was really disappointing that an exchange for the same price was not an option b/c now I didn't buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rial

customer_reviews.title: the boots are cute if you get the size right.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this boot, but the sizing is just crazy. My daughter wears an 11.5 and I saw they ran small so I ordered a 13 to give her a little room to grow. They arrived and looked like they were probably a size 9, so 4 sizes too small? Then I bought a size 2, and they looked like clown shoes, way too big! I will end up ordering a new brand because I don't want to keep wasting time returning these. Other than size, they're ADORABLE.
customer_reviews.author: sjriggs

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots, but we always buy 1 size DOWN
customer_reviews.text: These boots always run large on my girls. My 5-year old daughter wears a size 10 show in everything else, but her foot was swimming in the size 10 boot. We switched them for a size 9, and they fit perfectly. Thank goodness Amazon was allowing free returns on this boot, or I probably wouldn't have bought it knowing the size variability. These boots hold up really well and look adorable with everything. Gave 4 stars only because of the size issues.
customer_reviews.author: CeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Best kids rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought my son Western Chief rain boots from her local farm-feed store and since then we’ve been fans! He’s on his third pair (he’s four). They fit as expected. My son has really wide feet and these don’t present a sizing issue. His last pair did get a hold at the crease at the front of the foot where your toes bend. I imagine that’s normal for rubber boots. Those particular pair lasted him for about 5 months with lots of wear and tear. His current boots, shown here, are holding up amazing so far (he’s been wearing them for a few weeks now). And his first pair he grew out of. Anyways, I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: SFBeav

customer_reviews.title: Well made rain-boots that are easy for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these because I was tired of struggling with my toddlers Croc rainboots which were too narrow for his chubby feet. These Western Chief boots slip on beautifully. They’re well constructed and I’m sure he’ll grow out of them well before he could possibly wear them out. They’re heavier then his old pair but my son doesn’t seem to mind or notice.
customer_reviews.author: Camper Gurl

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, good fit for a wider foot
customer_reviews.text: We just got these for a boy who is going to camp this week and is jumping in puddles and wading in the creek. He saw them come out of the bag and insisted on putting them on immediately. He wants to wear them so a total win in my book. I can't comment yet on how well these hold up, but the fit has been fine. He wears a size 4 in street shoes and we ordered a size 4, they fit him with a little room to grow. The issue we have with most shoes is width as he does have a wider foot and these slip on and off with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Latoux

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: I just received two pairs of these that I had ordered for my kid’s Easter baskets next week. I researched a bunch and read a ton of reviews so I was very excited to find these. However, they are much larger than I thought they were going to be! I orders a size 3 kids for my 8 year old, and I could fit my foot in it. I am size 7 in women’s. It’s too late to return them now before Easter so that’s a little annoying. They do seems to be pretty durable looking though!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Perham

customer_reviews.title: A Real Price-Performer!
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself lucky to be able to wear kids(youth) sized shoes. I normally wear a women’s 5.5, but if they are narrow, then I need a size 6 and they are usually a little long. A girls size 4 is usually wider and the length is correct for my foot. These boots are well made. I like the height and the ‘handles’ make it easy to pull them on. The price was great for this boot.
customer_reviews.author: L. Orens

customer_reviews.title: RAIN BOOTS THAT LAST
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these boots for my grandchildren for several years and they hold up very well. Getting the correct size is the key...make sure you order up a size. This company's customer service could not be more helpful. They sent out a new size immediately and have been wonderful to deal with. These boots really do take a beating and do not fall apart. They last and last, and can be handed down from kid to kid. The colors are great. My grandkids just love them.
customer_reviews.author: DHMSHOP

customer_reviews.title: Cute and daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: These ran a tad larger than the other Western Chiefs in the same size 6. That being said, my daughter haven’t noticed and loves them so much she would sleep in them if I’d let her. She is very picky with how her shoes, underwear, pants and socks fit so for her to like these, I’m thrilled. They are not too heavy, the pull on straps are nice, but like all rubber boots, her feet sweat a lot in them, so may not be a good choice to wear to daycare or school especially if the daycare takes them outside in the colder months.
customer_reviews.author: Beltanette

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: The boots look nice enough, but I bought these boots with the expectation that they were made in the USA. Apparently, the main description says they are made in the USA, but the minute you select a specific product the description changes to "imported," i.e., made in China. I picked up some "Wonder Nation" boots from Walmart that are Made in Canada for $15. Amazon also sells some Kamik boots that are made in Canada.
customer_reviews.author: North Jersey

customer_reviews.title: These run a bit big but were great for a one-day snow trip!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son to wear to the snow and they were great with all his snow stuff on, multiple socks, etc. HOWEVER, for everyday rain wear, they constantly fall off his feet. They are a tiny bit big for him, but even with extra socks and tucking his pants in, they still fall off whenever we pick him up or he tries to run. If they happen to get wet inside (example: toddler falling in a puddle he's happily jumping in), they take a few days to dry out. All that said, my toddler loves his "boooooooota" and he especially loves that Mom has "boooooooota" too :)
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Some have poor durability
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 pairs of identical boots to pass down from one child to next. One pair has lasted well, one pair the strap broke one of first times worn but remained completely functional still. One pair the side blew out making them unwearable. Tried to glue the seem shut about a 3 inch tear between sole and boot but glue only lasted one wear. We have had them a while but given that they are worn so infrequently (while outside in the rain) would have expected them to be worn longer.
customer_reviews.author: 3 kids

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boot for my 2 year old. It is incredibly durable and has a nice tread to provide better traction. I also wanted a boot that had somewhat of a liner for warmth so she can use this when it is cold as well (not as a substitute for a snow boot but during spring and fall). It is a great boot for the money as well and fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Schnoor

customer_reviews.title: No better than the rainboots from Target
customer_reviews.text: They seem very well constructed, especially for the price. They are definitely heavier than my son's previous boots, but I attribute that to the more sturdy construction. I'll buy them again assuming they hold up as well as I hope. Update: 8-26-19 for as much as my kid has worn them, the soles have deteriorated faster than they should have. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Russell

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: The only place I could find black rain boots! As expected, I ordered up so we could get two seasons out of them. Runs true to size. Would order again. There were some discoloration white cloudy marks my daughter didn’t like, but I figured after wearing them once, they wouldn’t look new anyways.
customer_reviews.author: lish

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: These wellys are great quality. They are a little heavy but my toddler walked around in them fine. He did not want to take them off. We got one size bigger than his regular shoe size and they fit just fine without falling off. He has room to grow in them and they do not look too big. They fit true to size in my opinion. They are easy to clean and just great for the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Khaled

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler currently wears a size 5 shoe, but the size 5 was a little large on her. They work and she can walk around in them and jump in puddles, but they sometimes come off when she’s being carried.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My kids love their new galoshes. This was also perfect because their school would not allow printed or bright colored ones. They fit well and are easy to don/doff by themselves. They cannot get enough of it and wanna wear them everywhere! Good quality and good price :)
customer_reviews.author: red olives

customer_reviews.title: Love Western chief
customer_reviews.text: Western chief never lets us down. My son has wide feet and can still get these on by himself. They run on the bigger side, which is great for being able to wear them with big thick socks in the winter. We've never had a pair wear out, we pass them down and they look as good as they did day one.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine B.

customer_reviews.title: Let me handle it to you
customer_reviews.text: We returned these after 2 weeks because the handle broke. These are made for toddlers so they should be made strong enough to be pulled on by toddlers. The return process was speedy and we got a new pair. I was hoping it was a fluke. They started out fine but after a month, the same thing happened. I don't think my expectation for them to hold up is too high. Prior to this pair, my son had a pair of unknown brand name that we got from a garage sale and he wore them hard for 2 years (after someone else wore them hard) and the handles are still intact on those.
customer_reviews.author: mdee

customer_reviews.title: A little loose but not a dealbreaker
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my 6yo who normally wears a size 12 kid shoe. They are just a little loose, they look a bit more like maybe a 13 but it’s not so bad that he can’t walk in them. An extra pair of socks will fix the wiggle so it’s all good. We just got them last night and they seem sturdy and well made. All the seams are nice and snug and he says they are comfortable so we are happy
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Rain boots
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute on my toddler! No doubt my daughter will outgrow them long before they wear out. They’re very durable. I purchase a half size bigger than her feet, but these seem like they might run large anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: They look just like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the rain boots I was afraid to order them a little to small, so I ordered them a size bigger. My child wears a size 13 and I purchased a size 1 and she has not had any problems playing in them! So far so good! She has played outside in the mud with the dogs, ran outside through the grass, water and dirt with no issues. The boots are a bit heavy but over all they are really nice and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For My Perteen Daughter's For Halloween Costume 2019
customer_reviews.text: She want is be Coraline from the movie. This was pictured as advertised *BUT* this is NOT YOUTH 5Y SIZE!! This is Toddler Size 5T. If your Child is a Toddler 5T it may fit. BUT not a Perteen 5Y! The return & refund was easy & fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy-Sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect well made little boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and really well made! My daughter is in size 5 toddler and these where spot on with a little room. I'll have her wear heavy socks which isn't a bad thing. They are heavy and have a nice thick sole. The handles are nice and heavy duty, easy for little hands to pull up. Red is nice and bright, stands out well in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 sons with big feet! 7yo & 3yo. My 7yo wears 4-5-6 depending on the shoe lol and my 3yo a size 6. I was so nervous to try because I always underestimate their shoe size but both sizes fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: TVW

customer_reviews.title: Overall good boots
customer_reviews.text: We've been purchasing Western Chief brand rain boots for our son for 5ish years. Overall, they are good boots and hold up to standard wear/tear. We do buy one size larger than his current shoe size, just to get longer wear out of them. Downsides...the inserts come out & or bunch up extremely easy, annoying my son. I have noticed that the ALL black boots seem to last longer than the ones with prints. The ones with prints tend to come apart at the seams easily.
customer_reviews.author: B.Drew

customer_reviews.title: STURDY boots!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and sturdy, my little boy would wear these every day if I let him. I joke on sunny days that he looks like he's going clam digging. Lightly lined means your little one's feet won't get all sweaty. I'll buy this brand again once he outgrows them - or destroys them. Even taking a beating from a very active little boy (running, climbing trees, etc.) they haven't split or gotten a hole which is kinda miraculous.
customer_reviews.author: Ronan11

customer_reviews.title: Just a touch too big but great boots
customer_reviews.text: These are my son's first rain boots and he adores them. He's a solid size 7 but these boots are about a full size too big. I kept them at that size since I put him in thick boots to wear them outside, but keep in mind if you plan to use normal socks that you may want to size down by a full size.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Girard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality....run big.
customer_reviews.text: Toe box and width too wide. Make sure to order 1-2 size smaller. I ordered a 12 for my daughter who wears a 11.5 to make sure they fit with thick socks....fits like a size 2. Very big. However, on the plus side...they are adorable and good quality boots and the straps to pull them on are great.
customer_reviews.author: Masuda

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots because I needed some rain boots for my son to protect his feet in the rain. After using these for a while I can say they are worth the investment. They haven't shown any signs of wear and as expected, they protect feet from getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: BJ1517

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his boots
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big. But it did the trick for my 10 year old. He loves these boots and I'm sure he will go into them soon. They are very sturdy and do its job with protecting against rain and mud.
customer_reviews.author: G-Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for rain
customer_reviews.text: Both of my sons have these rain boots. My older son (4 years old) loves them and wants to wears them when someone mentions the slightest chance of rain. He loves that he can slide them on and off easily, with no laces to tie. They keep his socks and feet dry and their rubber sole doesn't slip on wet floors. My 1 year old isn't quite so thrilled with wearing them, but he doesn't care for shoes that much. I definitely don't blame the boots for them pulling them off within seconds of me putting them on him!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Tread has worn down and books leak!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned these boots for a little over two months. The get frequent wear and have wore down more than would be expected. They also leak!? Which really is disappointing. They are rain boots and my son's feet get wet when he wears them. This is the second pair we have owned in this brand. Our last leaked as well, though I assumed it was because they were old (1yr of use). Though, now I believe it is just the brand. We will be searching for a new pair now.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaLou McCutchan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for puddle jumper
customer_reviews.text: Good, well-made rain boots for a 3-year puddle-jumper. The quality is very nice but the boots are somewhat heavy; my toddler has no trouble walking or jumping while wearing theses but his legs seem to get tired fairly quickly from the weight of the boots. He definitely does not prefer to wear these for a long time. The boots run large. If you want the perfect fit, order down or at least true to your child's current shoe size. I personally ordered a size up to accommodate my child's fast growing feet.
customer_reviews.author: MrSPark

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy boot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots for kids. They seem sturdy and well made. Good color and nice trim. It did seem to run quite large though. My granddaughter wears a size 2 in every other shoe right now but these are hard for her to keep on. I will keep them for her to grow into since they are not something needed everyday but if you do need them to fit right now, a size down might be considered.
customer_reviews.author: kesinga

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boot!
customer_reviews.text: Love my little red boots. Wear a size 2 in a child's boot. Perfect for walking my dog on a rainy day and working in the garden. The color is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Wiginton

customer_reviews.title: Quality sketchy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but quality looks like they’ll fall apart during first use. Glue on inside fabric already coming off and pull tab looks like it will pop off!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up for my granddaughters... They fit perfectly and were completely waterproof. She loves them. Great for rainy days!
customer_reviews.author: Babs McGoo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Puddle Jumpers
customer_reviews.text: These boots gave my 2-year-old grandson some good-old-fashioned fun - puddle jumping! They are easy to get on, sturdy and keep those little tootsies dry. Who knew boots could rank right up there with toy cars!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wade

customer_reviews.title: Not durable; boot handle is poor in quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots about 1 year ago. My 3 yr old toddler girl has not worn these boots a few weeks If totaling the rain days here and there in Northern California since purchase, and one boot’s handle is already broken as of today. Since the break is unsightly, this means I have to buy another pair of boots for her.
customer_reviews.author: Detecting the pea

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Western Chief used to have good quality products, but sadly that is no longer the case. My grandson has worn these no more than a dozen times and the glue that holds the liner in is already coming off. Very dissapointed with the quality of these boots. Of course, it is just past the 30 day mark so I can no longer return them. I will NEVER purchase another pair of these again!
customer_reviews.author: TK17472

customer_reviews.title: Insoles come loose. Structure of outside is great.
customer_reviews.text: We got these so our four year old could put them on himself, to wear in the backyard. There isn’t much rain to speak of, but plenty of digging in the dirt and helping his mom & dad work in the yard. The insoles came loose and the boots seem to welcome dirt. Because his pants are inside the boots, the dirt comes right in.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Cause excess excitement
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson's birthday and since it's no fun puddle jumping alone bought a pair for each of his brothers too. The youngest was so excited he was jumping so much he tripped and crashed his chin on the pavement and had to get four stitches. Just beware they cause excessive excitement.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: These boots are HEAVY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 11 in pink with purple trim for my 5.5 yo who wears size 11-12 depending on the brand. These fit fine with socks with a bit of room to spare. They are really heavy though, definitely not easy to run in as she plods along. She loved the bright pink color though so we are keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: goboilers05

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had no quality issues with this brand. I’ve owned a few different pairs for my kids. They enjoy the handles to assist themselves putting them on. Great experiences with this being a younger guys boots.
customer_reviews.author: JasonG

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction! Broke after first use.
customer_reviews.text: My son just wore these for the very first time. The first time it really rained, my 6 year old can home from school and both shoes separated between the sole and boot at the seam! Since I purchased them 3-4 months ago I don't see a return option. He didn't wear them sooner because...Southern California. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Schlesinger

customer_reviews.title: Dependable, Sturdy Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my son, meaning to use them for his Halloween costume. They arrived on time, and looked exactly as expected. I bought the boots a bit large, hoping he will grow into them. That being said, by the end of the night, his feet were quite sore. I am sure that when he has sufficiently grown into them, the boots will be highly functional and comfortable. They are extremely sturdy and heavy-duty boots, which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahbf4

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, but too big
customer_reviews.text: Bummer, the size 1 ran huge and I had to go ahead and send them to overnight camp. That part's my own fault. Western Chief boots are always good quality though, and this pair seemed to be no exception. They are functional, and cute, but not so babyish that a 3rd grade boy wouldn't wear them to slosh through mud. ...if only they could have been smaller - so they'd stay on his feet in the mud!
customer_reviews.author: LorWhit

customer_reviews.title: Quality resistant good material boots
customer_reviews.text: My child love it .. feel very happy with them and comfortable.. good material and bright color ..
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: and they were very comfortable. My only complaint is the rubber smell
customer_reviews.text: We were expected to have a rainy Halloween so I ordered these for my daughter to wear with her devil costume trick or treating. She wore them all day at school on Friday, trick or treating from 5PM to 10PM with lots of walking, plus some other times here and there when it wasn't even raining, and they were very comfortable. My only complaint is the rubber smell, but that's to be expected and will dissipate...soon I hope.
customer_reviews.author: KristiC

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Really nice boots. Had them for a couple months now and theyre still holding up with constant stomping in the rain. I dont think they'll last past the season just because the inside sole is looking a bit worn, but by next year my son wont be in this size.
customer_reviews.author: Maureena Cole

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are off, otherwise they're great!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, seem sturdy, do their job, and my daughter loves them. As soon as they came in(today!!) she made me take her outside to jump in puddles. My two year old daughter is just fitting in size toddler 6's and the reviews said to order a size or two smaller. The smallest size was 5 so I went with it. Still a little to big but I'm sure she'll get another years use out of them :) I gave four stars because of the sizing issues, but other than that they seem great!
customer_reviews.author: fdizzle2012

customer_reviews.title: Check them out before you leave the store
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 pair for grandkids. Two pair totally came apart at the back seam that holds the shoe together. There is no glue that will stick to the rubber. Had to throw two new pair away. They were on sale end of year.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Deane

customer_reviews.title: Cute but I would have passed if I knew then what I know now
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my son a size too big and he has now surpassed that size they are adorable but the actual foot cavity is big so even though it now fits in length he still has trouble walking in them and them falling off because it's so loose good enough to not pay to return would I buy again or recommend... no
customer_reviews.author: jordyn brookes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. This is my son's second pair after ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. This is my son's second pair after he out grew the last ones. They last very well and are comfortable. My son can run around with these on all day and they don't bother his feet. They might be a little on the large size, but not enough to order a different size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: my grandson really likes them!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson took a walk in the pouring rain today to 'try out' his new boots. They were warm, 'bendy' and they kept his feet perfectly dry. A great review from a 4 1/2 year old who normally likes characters on his boots. He had too much fun in the downpour and running through the puddles to care if Dusty or Lightning McQueen was on the outside. We may add a few stickers later. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, fit as described, size 11-12. My daughter is a solid size 11 right now so they are probably a little big, but will be perfect when rainy season starts. I ordered them now, in the summer for a camping trip. They are perfect for keeping little feet clean at night in the dirt of a campsite, after a wash.
customer_reviews.author: Blue reader

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: Little man loves these. They are a bit heavy & big, but he loves pulling them on & off. They have room for thick socks in winter. Update: Dec 2016, I have purchased a second pair in a larger size as he was still wearing his original black ones that were at least 2 sizes too small now despite having been bought others of a different brand by grandma. These are the obvious favorite, and I love how they look.
customer_reviews.author: Sam&Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not super durable if that’s what you need
customer_reviews.text: Great boots but they split at the side after one week of wear by our child. He is rough on shoes and I thought these could handle him. Nope. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Butner Fam

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: When I buy rain boots for my son I always buy a size smaller because of how much room they have inside. They were just what I was looking for. I usually return rainboots if I don’t like the shape but these ones are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves her Western Chief Boots. ...Cute with a dress or out in the mud with jeans. The reinforced toe and pull handles are great features. This is our second pair. The first are still in excellent condition but she grew out of them. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great but run large. My son wears these several times a week when playing in our backyard. He wears a size 9 1/2 -10 in other shoes but the size 10 feel like a whole size larger. Our last pair lasted about 6-8 months before they started to crack where he bends his foot. They are water proof and my son never complains about them being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain if you can get over the plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots. Very durable and true to size. The plastic smell is INTENSE and I had to leave them outside for a couple of days after unpacking them.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Russell

customer_reviews.title: Rubber split within 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: We have had these a month and a half, and the rubber has split between the rough part above the toes and the smooth part over the top of the foot. We bought the solid red pair. Really disappointed, we've had other boots by this brand that held up for a year+.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peter

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We love Western Chief rain boots. These looked perfect with my daughter's Ladybug costume and now she has great mud boots.
customer_reviews.author: read_all_night

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and perfect fit with a little bit of growing room! My kiddo loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Bourland

customer_reviews.title: Great! Does not run big surprisingly
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult that has small feet and these for great. I wouldn't say to size up at all. I'm a 3 1/2 usually and the 3 for well. It's comfortable enough to wear thick socks in the winter time. Really good quality. If you have narrow feet then maybe size down.
customer_reviews.author: Zu

customer_reviews.title: seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids. Only had them for a few weeks but seem like they'll hold up long enough for the year that they'll fit my 7 year old's feet. She likes them
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Best boots!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great! We love western chief! Great for pumpkin patches, jumping in mud puddles, snow and Christmas tree hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: well made boot!
customer_reviews.text: this is a well made boot.. the material is sturdy and perfect for any rain storm.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Order a size DOWN! -
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, looks exactly as pictured - don't have a review on quality however many other positive reviews here. My son who is 4.5 wears a 10 in Stride Rite, I ordered a size 11 for next year, and they are big as expected, however I would agree - order a size down if you want them to fit, they are very big, not just a little.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was not a good purchase. The lining separated from the boot within 2 weeks. A week after that a handle snapped. And 2 weeks after that the toe separated from the sole. So we got about a month and half of wear out of them. When they were new they were water proof and the color is great, but overall the quality wasn’t good.
customer_reviews.author: alicia mcqueen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Very cute. They are comfortable and my 2 year old actually asks to wear them. We've purchased 3 pairs of these over the years for our kids and have always had great luck with quality. Cheaper rain boots have leaked or aren't comfortable. These are great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystine Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great boots - run large
customer_reviews.text: Definitely run big but they’re great boots. Even with socks, they’re still loose. Do NOT size up, even if your kid is “almost in” the next size up unless you don’t plan on using them for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These things hold up so well. Holy crap. They lasted being worn nearly everyday 3/4 of the year in Seattle weather. My kid runs a lot on concrete, and is not easy on shoes. These stood the test! And are so easy to put on the wriggling feet because of the stretchy handles.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my niece for a camping trip- she usually wears a 13 but reading reviews I went with a size 2 just to be sure! They were big but still wearable and she has time to grow into them! Very sturdy worked great! Will use this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots, this is our 4th pair because he has out grown them, easy to slip on and go!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up very well
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last at all. My kid loved these. Wore them non stop. They only held up for about 2months. He still wears them all blown out
customer_reviews.author: PHILBILLY

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is able to put these on and off with zero help and they keep him dry and comfy- A+ in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought them for her Halloween costume but she insists on wearing them all the time. She's a size 4/5 and 15mo old. These are a little big on her but with thick socks they fit pretty well and she can walk fine in them. Took a chance with the size and I'm happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy in pink
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots for a little girl. I was a little disappointed in the fact that fun printed "girly" boots were not available in big girls size 4. After all my granddaughter is only in 3rd grade. However these are nice and girly in pink and lavender. She loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this more than a year ago, and it still reeks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last January and the chemical/toxic smell has never dissipated. Maybe it’s not all the colors? I purchased in black. I didn’t want to buy an expensive rain boot, as kids grow so quickly, but it wasn’t worth it to pinch pennies on this one.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: They are alright but heavy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are extremely heavy for a toddler... I feel like if I wore shoes this heavy my back would be Killing me... I also thought they had like a fuzzy liner inside and they Do Not...
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: Good boots!
customer_reviews.text: Water proof. Easy for my 3 year old to put on independently with the handles. Have had lots of use in mud and sand and still look practically new.
customer_reviews.author: Adrea

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Size 1Y. very disappointed in quality. just opened. out of the box and the insole in the right boot is 5 sizes too small! which leaves it very uncomfortable to wear. and the boot cardboard/paper that goes inside the boot for shipping was loose in the bag. This obviously was a previous return that Amazon resold.
customer_reviews.author: Reasonable mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and solid boots. Keep your kids feet dry. These boots are fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: YouAreWhatYouWish

customer_reviews.title: My 2.5 year old daughter literally sleeps in these!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, that's right. My My 2.5 year old daughter literally sleeps in these boots. However, I would say that's mostly because she just loves new shoes as much as her Momma. Anyhoo...These boots do seem to run a tad big. I would say about a half size too big. They are extremely sturdy, so they should last a long time. They are a bit on the heavy side too. Not like your average cheap rain boots. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after ONE wear!
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots for my son but after one day of wear ( Yes ONE day) the top loop broke off. So sad that we paid money for something to fall apart after 1 wear. Since we haven't gotten a lot of rain we didn't wear them right when he got them in January so its too late to exchange. When I went to contact the seller there was no where to contact anyone. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCormick

customer_reviews.title: These are bit heavy for little legs and are much ...
customer_reviews.text: These are bit heavy for little legs and are much bigger. I would suggest downsizing these. My daugher wears a 9 but these 9 fit way to big and clunky for her to wear comforatably or safely. I'll keep them and maybe she can wear them next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase, awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these boots is great!! Much thicker and more durable than other toddler rain boots. I love the black color. They will go with everything and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these boots! They are easy to put on and take off!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn Rice

customer_reviews.title: Finally boots that are totally waterproof+++
customer_reviews.text: I like to walk my dog in heavy rain. All "water-proof" hiking or snow boots finally leak. But these rubber boots keep my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Maiia Muiia

customer_reviews.title: These are great boots for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots for the price. Fits just as I expected, and my son can comfortably wear them all day at school without trouble. I like that he can get them off and on completely independently. They're still looking almost brand new and he's been wearing them daily for a few months. Will definitely purchase again when he outgrows this pair!
customer_reviews.author: AKT

customer_reviews.title: Great for splashing in the puddles!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé’s son loves these because his father is a fireman and these “look like dads boots” and we love playing in the rain with these boots. They keep his feet dry and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots for a great price. They are super comfortable and my son loves wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: YanYan

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old son loves his boots!!! It rained the day after we got them and he was so excited to wear them. He loves that they are yellow and look like boots in the “pictures”. He had an easy time putting them on by himself
customer_reviews.author: Mushka

product_meta.title: Western Chief Kids' Waterproof Rubber Classic Rain Boot with Pull Handles
product_meta.description: Western Chief was founded in Seattle in 1891 to produce rugged outdoor boots designed to meet the harsh conditions of the Alaska Gold Rush. Today, they are still committed to making the same high quality, rugged work footwear. Built with the finest materials to demanding standards, their footwear keeps people warm and dry, comfortable and stylish, safe and secure.
feature_bullets: KID-FRIENDLY WATERPROOF BOOTS |The main material we use in our Unisex Solid Waterproof Rain Boots is natural rubber, which is durable, flexible, and waterproof. The handmade vulcanization process reduces weak spots in our rubber.

SOFT AND COZY POLY/COTTON LINING | Nobody wants to wear boots that are abrasive and rough – especially kids! We line our boots with soft, polyester/cotton blend lining to give comfort. Our lining also absorbs moisture.

A BENEFICIAL INSOLE | Children are rough on boots and need a comfortable insole to run around on. Our rubber boots are made with a cozy EVA insole. Our insoles are removable, making them easy to replace and clean.

SAFETY FEATURE |Our boots are made with a slip-resistant outsole to help provide traction on slippery surfaces! The outsole is also self-cleaning, meaning you won’t have to wash mud and other grub off the boots.

EASY ON AND OFF | To make your day a bit easier, we make our boots with two handles that your child can use to pull them on and off! This promotes independent dressing and is perfect for the family on the go!

EASY CARE | We recommend cleaning your boots with a damp, warm cloth and mild liquid dish soap. A silicone conditioner can also be used. Air dry all boots.We suggest storing our boots in a cool, dry area to help prevent the boot from damage.
TOE CAP AND MUD GUARD | Our Unisex Solid Waterproof Rain Boots have a rubber mud guard to protect against dirt. These boots also include a toe cap for protection.
MEASUREMENTS | The shaft measures an estimated 6.5” from the arch.
